projects.title: Amazon Data Scrapper
remarks: This tool scrapes the product pages from Amazon using the search words given input to the program.
It extract the meaningful data related to the products from retrieved pages,load data as as Flat file into secondary memory.

projects.title: FreeLancing Web Application
projects.skills: React | NodeJs | Express | MongoDB | HTML | Js | CSS
remarks: Led a project of 5 member group to accomplish an end to end Full Stack Web Application.
This web application bridges the gap between freelancers and companies,individual people hiring for temporary job roles are projects.

My contribution in the project includes DataBase design with MongoDB, User Authorisation using web tokens, Real-time Chat functionality implementation between users using socket IO, API Design and development using NodeJS Middle-ware implementation and several front-end Pages development.

projects.title: Prediction of Drug Resistance in Tuberculosis
projects.skills: Python | pandas | Data Preprocessing | Machine Learning
remarks: Designed Machine learning models to predict the drug resistance of Tuberculosis
The machine learning model is trained using the gene variations occurs in the tuberculosis isolates which results in drug resistance.
Accomplished an F1 score of 0.95 which signifies the good performance of machine learning model to reduce false positives and False negatives.

projects.title: Spelling Correction Tool
remarks: Python tool to correct spelling errors
This tool uses a course search technique:N-gram indexing to identify spelling errors in the words.
